summary: Some lines i recorded too be used for custon NPC (Follower) will be expanded by time
descriptionHtml:
I decieded too give something back. Since i can not Mod or Texture or Model or anything like that i decided too add some Voiced Lines here. I will expand them with time too come and try to improve it.

You can use this like ever you wish, you need just some lines? take them, you want to try with them for modding? Take them. You like too make an npc with it? Do it.

I do take request and try too expand this Collection of lines and would like too add even spefic ones. (like special Places, Events etc) but i need the text then from you.
and since I am German nativ Speaker - I can do German Voices if you need.
The Voice used here is more a "overall" bored Person. If i got time i maybe do some others.
author: Achon
